values: 侧面；边；边缘；侧旋；一侧；一方；方面；立场；队伍；边缘区域；旁边；侧边；侧翼；侧向；侧身；侧部；（立体的）面；（事物左方或右方的）一旁；一扇（牛肉、猪肉等）；近旁；一方的意见（或态度、立场）；一面纸的文字
支持；站在…一边；与…持同样观点；偏袒

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 支持（side的现在分词）；给…装上侧面；收拾，整理

word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重以特定观点对事物进行观察或考虑。
可与aspect和phase换用，但更着重构成事物全貌的一个或多个方面。
指可以对事物进行观察或描述或考虑的任何方面。
专指从某一角度去观察、考虑事物的某个方面。

word_group.brief_definition: (药物的)副作用, 未曾预料的后果, 意外的连带后果

word_group.phrase: two sides of the same coin

word_group.brief_definition: 不挡道；靠边；在旁边；放到一边；暂不考虑
肩并肩地, 一起；相互支持地, 合作地

word_group.phrase: Two sides of the same coin.

word_group.brief_definition: 光明面；令人高兴的一面；好的一面

bilingual.source: By her side was a small suitcase.
bilingual.target: 她身边有一个小行李箱。

bilingual.source: Kate saw a dog by the side of the road.
bilingual.target: 凯特在路边看到了一只狗。

bilingual.source: James fought on the side of the Patriots.
bilingual.target: 詹姆斯站在爱国者一边作战。

bilingual.source: She spun a web reaching to the other side.
bilingual.target: 她织了一张网到达了另一边。

bilingual.source: Possum set out for the other side of the world.
bilingual.target: 负鼠出发前往世界的另一边。

bilingual.source: My grandmother lives on the other side of the earth.
bilingual.target: 我的祖母住在地球的另一边。

bilingual.source: You start searching from the other side of the room?
bilingual.target: 你从房间的另一边开始找？

list.abstract: 英文单词，基本意是边，另外也是某苏格兰乐队单曲的名字

yingyinNormal.en: Switch. Huh? Switch sides. Argue the other side. Farkle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 换边。什么？交换立场，正反方互换。法尔科？

yingyinNormal.en: I need you by my side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要你在我身边。

yingyinNormal.en: She didn't take my side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她没站在我这边。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't see the outside-side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看不见外面的那一边。

yingyinNormal.en: I do. He's on the other side of this wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，他在墙的另外一边。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, before I forget, that side is still wet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，趁着我还记得，那边油漆未干。

yingyinNormal.en: Just once, I would like Mitchell to take my side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪怕一次也好，我希望米奇尔站在我这边。

yingyinNormal.en: What other side? Jack, there's two sides to everything. Not on an octagon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么另一边？杰克，每件事物都有两边。八边形就不是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: My sister Jill would be throwing up over the side and Dad would be upset because nobody helped him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妹妹吉儿，则会靠在船边呕吐，我爸会不高兴，因为没有人帮他忙。

yingyinNormal.en: So people who are watching and think that I won't lose will make a side bet. Now, this is the first synthetic CDO.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以有些人边观察边想，我不会输，然后开始下注，这是第一个综合债务担保。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a performer. You kneel down on the wire. You unhook from side, clip it on the other. The audience will think you are saluting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是表演者，在钢索上跪下来，解开侧边钩子，夹在另一边，观众会以为你在敬礼。

yingyinNormal.en: That's your side and this is my side. Do not cross the invisible line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那边是你的，而这一边是我的地盘。不许跨过这条隐形的界线。

yingyinNormal.en: And our side, the side of education and accomplishment is the future of civilization!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们这边，是受教育是文明的未来！

yingyinNormal.en: And they're nothing compared to what it can unleash. But with it on our side... Is it? Are you on our side?
yingyinNormal.zh: 而他们都无法和宝石的力量相比拟，但如果有它站在我们一边…是吗？你是？我们这边的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So whose side are you on? I wish I didn't have to decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你站哪边？真希望我不用做决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm on the side of life. Ultron isn't. He will end it all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我站在生命这边，奥创则不是，他想毁灭一切。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you sit on the side and don't talk. That seems fair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有，你们坐在旁边，没有台词。还算公平。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a partner, I'm adding va... Whose side are you on, anyway?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是合伙人，我能增加...不过你到底是站在哪一边啊？

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing? Get back over on your side of the... Hello.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你干嘛？回去那边坐... 喂。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Now, who from our side do we need to massage? Womack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我们这边得去安抚谁？乌麦克。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 一边; 一侧; 一旁
(on/to one side)搁置; 暂不处理
(be on sb's side)支持; 站在...一边

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 到一边；在旁边；除去；以备未来之用；撇开
n. 河边；河畔；（Riverside）人名：里弗赛德

word_family.mean: n. 边；缘；面；侧面；边缘区域；旁边；一方；侧旋；吹嘘；自负；傲慢

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 边对边；换边；从一侧到另一侧

sense_info_list.en: one of the two or more people or groups taking part in an argument, war, etc.

examination_example.sentence: Like physical fights, verbal fights can leave both <highlight>sides</highlight> bloodied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像身体上的打斗一样，言语上的争斗会让双方都血流成河。

examination_example.sentence: Humility requires you to recognize weakness in your own arguments and sometimes also to accept reasons on the opposite <highlight>side</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谦逊要求你要认识到自己论点中的不足，有时也要接受对方的理由。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't feel like a human or democratic relationship, even if both <highlight>sides</highlight> benefit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这感觉不像是一种人人际关系或民主关系，即使双方都受益。

sense_info_list.en: a particular aspect of something, especially a situation or a person's character

examination_example.sentence: And yet, it would be a mistake to think we are right now simply experiencing the painful <highlight>side</highlight> of a boom and bust cycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果认为我们现在只是在经历繁荣和萧条周期中痛苦的一面，那将是一个错误。

examination_example.sentence: Long is Britain's best-known Land Artist and his Stone Circle represents the elegant, rarefied <highlight>side</highlight> of the form.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 朗是英国最著名的地景艺术家，他的作品《石圈》代表了这种形式优雅、稀有的一面。

examination_example.sentence: Pyle was famous for covering the human <highlight>side</highlight> of the war.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Pyle 因报道战争中人性的一面而闻名。

sense_info_list.en: a position or an area to the left or right of something
sense_info_list.zh: 一边; 一侧; 一旁

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, the asocial robot simply moved forwards and backwards and <highlight>side</highlight> to <highlight>side</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，非社会性机器人只是向前、向后和向两侧移动。

examination_example.sentence: Some expected a Greek Revival twin of the Treasury Building to be erected on the other <highlight>side</highlight> of the White House.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人期望在白宫的另一侧建起一座希腊复兴风格的财政部大楼“双子楼”。

sense_info_list.en: to be dealt with later
sense_info_list.zh: (on/to one side)搁置; 暂不处理

examination_example.sentence: It needs to put historical prejudices to one <highlight>side</highlight> and take some steps to address our urgent housing need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它（政府）需要将历史偏见放在一边，并采取一些措施来解决我们迫切的住房需求。

examination_example.sentence: When I think of a sad memory, I do what everybody does—try to put it to one <highlight>side</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我想起一段悲伤的记忆时，我会像每个人一样——试着把它放在一边。

sense_info_list.en: to support and agree with somebody
sense_info_list.zh: (be on sb's side)支持; 站在...一边

examination_example.sentence: Here are some ways that you can get the whole office on your <highlight>side</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有一些方法，你可以让整个办公室都站在你这边。

sense_info_list.en: agree with

examination_example.sentence: Only Ukip, sensing its chance, has <highlight>sided</highlight> with those pleading for a more considered approach to using green land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有英国独立党意识到了自己的机会，支持那些恳求以更谨慎的方式使用绿地的人。

sense_info_list.en: a line of ancestors traced back from either parent
the part of the body from under the arm to the top of the leg
a part or an area of something near the edge and away from the middle
a place next to something
an opinion or position viewed as opposite or different from another
each of the flat surfaces of a solid object
an extra dish of food
a television channel

word_usage.usage:
side表示“侧面; 一侧; 一边”时，为可数名词，但多以单数形式出现。例：
There's nothing but woods on the other side of the highway.
公路对面只有树林。

side可用作形容词，表示“在边上的; 旁边的”，引申表示“次要的”，在句中多作前置定语，例：
Don't divert the subject into a side issue.
别把话题转向枝节问题。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (药物的)副作用；未曾预料的后果；意外的连带后果
流行单曲唱片的反面；B面；对应面；对立面；反面

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 片面的；偏袒的；单面的；力量不均的；不等的；悬殊的；单方面的；单边的；一面较大的；一面发达的
adv. 到一边；在旁边；除去；以备未来之用；撇开
adv. & adj. 向一边；向旁边；从一边；从旁边；一边（或一侧）向前地；平级变动地；间接地；非常规的；非正统的

word_family.mean: n. 边；缘；面；侧面；边缘区域；旁边；一方；侧旋；吹嘘；自负；傲慢

sense_info_list.en: each of the flat surfaces of a solid object

examination_example.sentence: When both <highlight>sides</highlight> are sympathetic with each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当双方都同情对方时。

examination_example.sentence: When both <highlight>sides</highlight> have a lot of things in common.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当双方有很多共同点的时候。

examination_example.sentence: When both <highlight>sides</highlight> make interesting contributions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当双方都做出有趣的贡献时。

sense_info_list.en: a part of one's character

examination_example.sentence: On the less cute and more scary <highlight>side</highlight> there is Actroid F, which is so human-like that some patients may not know the difference.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在不那么可爱和令人恐惧的方面，还有Actroid F，它和人类很像，以至于有些患者可能不知道它们之间的区别。

sense_info_list.en: an opinion or position viewed as opposite or different from another

examination_example.sentence: When it comes to changing people's minds, it is very difficult to jump from one <highlight>side</highlight> to another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当涉及到改变人们的想法时，从一个方面跳到另一个方面是非常困难的。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people involved in a competition, dispute, or war
agree with
a place next to something

word_usage.usage: side无比较级和最高级形式。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 未曾预料的后果；意外的连带后果

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 到一边；在旁边；除去；以备未来之用；撇开

word_family.mean: n. 边；缘；面；侧面；边缘区域；旁边；一方；侧旋；吹嘘；自负；傲慢

sense_info_list.en: each of the flat surfaces of a solid object

examination_example.sentence: I think I might try that big new supermarket on the other <highlight>side</highlight> of town and see what they have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想我可能会去城镇另一边新开的那家大超市弄清他们有什么。

examination_example.sentence: The new market on the other <highlight>side</highlight> of town.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新集市在城镇的另一边。

examination_example.sentence: Four panels on one <highlight>side</highlight> of that roof could save a family of four around $ 300 a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 屋顶一侧的四个面板每年可以为一个四口之家节省约 300 美元。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people involved in a competition; dispute; or war
agree with

examination_example.sentence: Most importantly, it is against the law. So we will <highlight>side</highlight> with the majority of the people of Philadelphia who oppose this tax and take legal action to stop it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是，这项征税是违法的。因此，我们将站在反对这项征税的大多数费城人民一边，并采取法律行动来阻止它征税。

sense_info_list.en: an opinion or position viewed as opposite or different from another

examination_example.sentence: We also investigated the social <highlight>side</highlight> of the high school transition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们也调查了高中转型的社会观点。

sense_info_list.en: related to something in a minor or unimportant way
a place next to something
an extra dish of food
a part of one's character

word_usage.usage: side无比较级和最高级形式。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (药物的)副作用；未曾预料的后果；意外的连带后果
光明面；令人高兴的一面；好的一面

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 到一边；在旁边；除去；以备未来之用；撇开
n. 河边；河畔；（Riverside）人名：里弗赛德

word_family.mean: n. 边；缘；面；侧面；边缘区域；旁边；一方；侧旋；吹嘘；自负；傲慢

examination_example.sentence: At this store, people check out and then go off to the <highlight>side</highlight> to bag their own groceries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这家商店里，人们退房，然后走到一边去打包他们自己的食品。

examination_example.sentence: Motivation and goal setting are the two <highlight>sides</highlight> of same coin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动机和目标设定是同一枚硬币的两面。

examination_example.sentence: On one part of the screen, a symbol would appear, and on the other <highlight>side</highlight> two symbols inside a circle were shown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 屏幕的一部分会出现一个符号，另一侧则显示一个圆圈内的两个符号。

examination_example.sentence: If you look at all <highlight>sides</highlight> of the situation, you'll find probably a solution that suits everyone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你全面考虑情况，你可能会找到适合每个人的解决方案。

examination_example.sentence: This is a quick look at life in Uzbekistan, made of friendliness and warmth, but also its darker <highlight>side</highlight> of society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是对乌兹别克斯坦生活的一个快速观察，它既有友好和温暖，也有社会黑暗的一面。

examination_example.sentence: Seeing the positive <highlight>side</highlight> of things doesn't mean you're ignoring what happened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看到事情的积极方面并不意味着你对发生的事情视而不见。

examination_example.sentence: Dreams might be a <highlight>side</highlight> effect of memory making.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦可能是记忆制造的副作用。

examination_example.sentence: Another <highlight>side</highlight> benefit of getting fresh air is sunlight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 获得新鲜空气的另一个好处是阳光。

examination_example.sentence: Baskets of perfect red strawberries, the red-painted <highlight>sides</highlight> of the coffee truck; and most of all, the large, soft and red tomatoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篮篮完美的红色草莓，涂成红色侧面的咖啡车；最重要的是，又大又软又红的西红柿。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 次要的; 副的; 旁

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 到一边；在旁边；除去；以备未来之用；撇开
n. 河边；河畔；（Riverside）人名：里弗赛德

word_family.mean: n. 边；缘；面；侧面；边缘区域；旁边；一方；侧旋；吹嘘；自负；傲慢

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: two sides of the same coin

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不挡道；靠边；在旁边；放到一边；暂不考虑
肩并肩地；一起；相互支持地；合作地

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: Two sides of the same coin.

sense_info_list.en: each of the flat surfaces of a solid object

examination_example.sentence: There is a man's face on the other <highlight>side</highlight> of the map.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地图的另一边有一张人脸。

examination_example.sentence: From Tony's <highlight>side</highlight> it was white, but from my <highlight>side</highlight> it was black.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从托尼这边看是白色的，而从我这边看是黑色的。

examination_example.sentence: The grass is always greener on the other <highlight>side</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这山望着那山高。

sense_info_list.en: a particular aspect of something, especially a situation or a person's character

examination_example.sentence: A person who has media literacy would realize that each story is about one <highlight>side</highlight> at this time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个有媒体素养的人会意识到此时每个故事都只是关于一方面的。

examination_example.sentence: Look at articles or books on all <highlight>sides</highlight> of the subject.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看关于这个主题各个方面的文章或书籍。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to find out both <highlight>sides</highlight> of the story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解事情的两面性很重要。

sense_info_list.en: a place next to something

examination_example.sentence: Tea plants are grown on the <highlight>sides</highlight> of mountains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 茶树生长在山坡上。

examination_example.sentence: Take a walk on the wild <highlight>side</highlight> at the San Diego Zoo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在圣地亚哥动物园的野外散步。

examination_example.sentence: He sat on a wheelchair with a computer by his <highlight>side</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他坐在轮椅上，身边放着一台电脑。

sense_info_list.en: an extra dish of food

examination_example.sentence: With his parents' help, Ewan used social media to ask for more turkeys, plus <highlight>side</highlight> dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在父母的帮助下，伊万利用社交媒体要了更多火鸡和配菜。

examination_example.sentence: He shouldn't ride it <highlight>side</highlight> by <highlight>side</highlight> with his friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他不应该和他的朋友们并排骑它。

sense_info_list.zh: 次要的; 副的; 旁

examination_example.sentence: Or why your navigation app took you on the <highlight>side</highlight> street instead of the highway?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 或者为什么你的导航应用把你带到了侧街而不是高速公路上？

word_usage.usage: side无比较级和最高级形式。
